casebody.data:
ACTS RETIREMENT-LIFE COMMUNITIES, INC.
v.
TOWN OF COLUMBUS 334PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 28, 2018 Ryan D. Bolick, Virginia M. Wooten, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, for Town of Columbus, North Carolina Benjamin R. Sullivan, Jr., Charles C. Meeker, Stephen V. Carey, Raleigh, Attorneys at Law, for ACTS Retirement-Life Communities, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Joint Motion filed on the 28th of March 2018 to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of March 2018."
